page.title: 17GAMES WE PLAY
page.content: STUCK IN THE MUD. Two people have to be on it. They chase and catch the hildren who then have to stand still with their legs astride. Ff another person can pass through the legs then they are free. KERBY. For this game you need a football.One person stands on one side of the road and the other on the opposite side.You throw the ball across the road and if it hits the kurb and bounces back you get a point.You keep going until you miss. MOB. This is a game of hide and seek.You hide and the person on it looks for you.If they find you then run back to the mobbing post.If you can get to the mobbing post without being seen then all those caught are free.The game ends when all the players are caught.
